00067 void activate_output(unsigned char from_addr, unsigned char index, unsigned char type) {
00068         driver_status.driver_output_state |= (1<<(index-1));
00069         driver_status.driver_output_owner[index-1] = from_addr;
00070 
00071         driver_status.driver_output_type[index-1] = type;
00072 
00073         switch (index) {
00074                 case 1 :        PORTB |= (1<<4);
00075                                                         break;
00076                 case 2 :        PORTB |= (1<<5);
00077                                                         break;
00078                 case 3 :        PORTB |= (1<<6);
00079                                                         break;
00080                 case 4 :        PORTB |= (1<<7);
00081                                                         break;
00082                 case 5 :        PORTG |= (1<<3);
00083                                                         break;
00084                 case 6 :        PORTG |= (1<<4);
00085                                                         break;
00086                 case 7 :        PORTD |= (1<<4);
00087                                                         break;
00088                 case 8 :        PORTD |= (1<<5);
00089                                                         break;
00090                 case 9 :        PORTD |= (1<<6);
00091                                                         break;
00092                 case 10 :       PORTD |= (1<<7);
00093                                                         break;
00094                 case 11 :       PORTC |= (1<<0);
00095                                                         break;
00096                 case 12 :       PORTC |= (1<<1);
00097                                                         break;
00098                 case 13 :       PORTC |= (1<<2);
00099                                                         break;
00100                 case 14 :       PORTC |= (1<<3);
00101                                                         break;
00102                 case 15 :       PORTC |= (1<<4);
00103                                                         break;
00104                 case 16 :       PORTC |= (1<<5);
00105                                                         break;
00106                 case 17 :       PORTC |= (1<<6);
00107                                                         break;
00108                 case 18 :       PORTC |= (1<<7);
00109                                                         break;
00110                 case 19 :       PORTG |= (1<<2);
00111                                                         break;
00112                 case 20 :       PORTA |= (1<<7);
00113                                                         break;
00114                 default: 
00115                                                         break;
00116         }
00117 }

00125 void deactivate_output(unsigned char from_addr, unsigned char index) {
00126         driver_status.driver_output_state &= ~(1<<(index-1));
00127         driver_status.driver_output_owner[index-1] = from_addr;
00128         driver_status.driver_output_type[index-1] = 0;
00129 
00130         switch (index) {
00131                 case 1 :        PORTB &= ~(1<<4);
00132                                                         break;
00133                 case 2 :        PORTB &= ~(1<<5);
00134                                                         break;
00135                 case 3 :        PORTB &= ~(1<<6);
00136                                                         break;
00137                 case 4 :        PORTB &= ~(1<<7);
00138                                                         break;
00139                 case 5 :        PORTG &= ~(1<<3);
00140                                                         break;
00141                 case 6 :        PORTG &= ~(1<<4);
00142                                                         break;
00143                 case 7 :        PORTD &= ~(1<<4);
00144                                                         break;
00145                 case 8 :        PORTD &= ~(1<<5);
00146                                                         break;
00147                 case 9 :        PORTD &= ~(1<<6);
00148                                                         break;
00149                 case 10 :       PORTD &= ~(1<<7);
00150                                                         break;
00151                 case 11 :       PORTC &= ~(1<<0);
00152                                                         break;
00153                 case 12 :       PORTC &= ~(1<<1);
00154                                                         break;
00155                 case 13 :       PORTC &= ~(1<<2);
00156                                                         break;
00157                 case 14 :       PORTC &= ~(1<<3);
00158                                                         break;
00159                 case 15 :       PORTC &= ~(1<<4);
00160                                                         break;
00161                 case 16 :       PORTC &= ~(1<<5);
00162                                                         break;
00163                 case 17 :       PORTC &= ~(1<<6);
00164                                                         break;
00165                 case 18 :       PORTC &= ~(1<<7);
00166                                                         break;
00167                 case 19 :       PORTG &= ~(1<<2);
00168                                                         break;
00169                 case 20 :       PORTA &= ~(1<<7);
00170                                                         break;
00171                 default: 
00172                                                         break;
00173         }
00174 }

00180 unsigned int lm76_get_temp(void) {
00181         unsigned char temp[2];
00182         i2cMasterReceiveNI(LM76_ADDR,2,(unsigned char *)temp);
00183 
00184         return((((temp[0]<<8) | temp[1]) >> 3));
00185 }

00190 void bus_parse_message(void) {
00191         BUS_MESSAGE bus_message = rx_queue_get();
00192 
00193         if (bus_message.cmd == BUS_CMD_ACK)
00194                 bus_message_acked(bus_message.from_addr);
00195         else if (bus_message.cmd == BUS_CMD_NACK)
00196                 bus_message_nacked(bus_message.from_addr, bus_message.data[0]);
00197         else if (bus_message.cmd == BUS_CMD_PING) {
00198                 //If the ping is coming from a mainbox, we need to save ptt input information for the interlock
00199                 if (bus_message.data[0] == DEVICE_ID_MAINBOX) {
00200                         //Check so that the PTT interlock input is <> 0
00201                         if (bus_message.data[1] != 0) {
00202                                 if (bus_message.from_addr != driver_status.ptt_interlock_input[bus_message.data[1]-1]) {
00203                                         //TODO: Make code to confirm this by sending a question to the openASC box that this value is actually correct
00204                                         //      That way we are absolutely sure that this setting sent is 100% correct
00205                                         driver_status.ptt_interlock_input[bus_message.data[1]] = bus_message.from_addr;
00206                                 }
00207                         }
00208                         else {
00209                                 //If we have that no input should be configured for this device, then we go through the list
00210                                 //to make sure if the setting has been changed, it is also removed from the list
00211                                 for (unsigned char i=0;i<7;i++)
00212                                         if (driver_status.ptt_interlock_input[i] == bus_message.from_addr)
00213                                                 driver_status.ptt_interlock_input[i] = 0;
00214                         }
00215                 }
00216         }
00217         switch (bus_message.cmd) {
00218                 case BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_ANT_OUTPUT:
00219                         for (unsigned char i=0;i<bus_message.length;i++)
00220                                 activate_output(bus_message.from_addr,bus_message.data[i], BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_ANT_OUTPUT);
00221                         break;
00222                 case BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_ANT_OUTPUT:
00223                         for (unsigned char i=0;i<bus_message.length;i++)
00224                                 deactivate_output(bus_message.from_addr,bus_message.data[i]);
00225                         break;
00226                 case BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_BAND_OUTPUT:
00227                         for (unsigned char i=0;i<bus_message.length;i++)
00228                                 activate_output(bus_message.from_addr,bus_message.data[i], BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_BAND_OUTPUT);
00229                         break;
00230                 case BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_RX_ANT_OUTPUT:
00231                         for (unsigned char i=0;i<bus_message.length;i++)
00232                                 activate_output(bus_message.from_addr,bus_message.data[i], BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_RX_ANT_OUTPUT);
00233                         break;
00234                 case BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_RX_BAND_OUTPUT:
00235                         for (unsigned char i=0;i<bus_message.length;i++)
00236                                 activate_output(bus_message.from_addr,bus_message.data[i], BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_RX_BAND_OUTPUT);
00237                         break;
00238                 case BUS_CMD_DRIVER_GET_STATUS:
00239                         
00240                         break;
00241                 case BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_ALL_OUTPUTS:
00242                         for (unsigned char i=1;i<=20;i++)
00243                                 if (driver_status.driver_output_owner[i-1] == bus_message.from_addr)
00244                                         deactivate_output(bus_message.from_addr,i);
00245                         break;
00246                 case BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_ALL_ANT_OUTPUTS:
00247                         for (unsigned char i=1;i<=20;i++)
00248                                 if (driver_status.driver_output_type[i-1] == BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_ANT_OUTPUT)
00249                                         deactivate_output(bus_message.from_addr,i);
00250                         break;
00251                 case BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_ALL_RX_ANTENNA_OUTPUTS:
00252                         for (unsigned char i=1;i<=20;i++)
00253                                 if (driver_status.driver_output_type[i-1] == BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_RX_ANT_OUTPUT)
00254                                         deactivate_output(bus_message.from_addr,i);
00255                         break;
00256                 case BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_RX_ANT_OUTPUT:
00257                         for (unsigned char i=0;i<bus_message.length;i++)
00258                                 deactivate_output(bus_message.from_addr,bus_message.data[i]);
00259                         break;
00260                 case BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_ALL_RX_BAND_OUTPUTS:
00261                         for (unsigned char i=1;i<=20;i++)
00262                                 if (driver_status.driver_output_type[i-1] == BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_RX_BAND_OUTPUT)
00263                                         deactivate_output(bus_message.from_addr,i);
00264                         break;
00265                 case BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_RX_BAND_OUTPUT:
00266                         for (unsigned char i=0;i<bus_message.length;i++)
00267                                 deactivate_output(bus_message.from_addr,bus_message.data[i]);
00268                         break;
00269                 case BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_ALL_BAND_OUTPUTS:
00270                         for (unsigned char i=1;i<=20;i++)
00271                                 if (driver_status.driver_output_type[i-1] == BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_BAND_OUTPUT)
00272                                         deactivate_output(bus_message.from_addr,i);
00273                         break;
00274                 case BUS_CMD_GET_TEMPERATURE:
00275                         /*unsigned int temp_t = lm76_get_temp();
00276                         unsigned char temp[2];
00277                         temp[0] = (temp_t & 0xFF00) >> 8;
00278                         temp[1] = (temp_t & 0x00FF);
00279 
00280                         bus_add_tx_message(bus_get_address(), bus_message.from_addr, 0, BUS_CMD_GET_TEMPERATURE,2, temp);*/
00281                         break;
00282                 case BUS_CMD_SET_PTT_SETTINGS:
00283                         /* Data[0..n] -> | ADDR | INPUT # | */
00284                         driver_status.ptt_interlock_input[(int)bus_message.data[1]] = bus_message.data[0];
00285                         break;
00286                 case BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_SUBMENU_ANT1_OUTPUT:
00287                         for (unsigned char i=0;i<bus_message.length;i++)
00288                                 activate_output(bus_message.from_addr,bus_message.data[i], BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_SUBMENU_ANT1_OUTPUT);
00289                         break;
00290                 case BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_SUBMENU_ANT1_OUTPUT:
00291                         for (unsigned char i=0;i<bus_message.length;i++)
00292                                 deactivate_output(bus_message.from_addr,bus_message.data[i]);
00293                         break;
00294                 case BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_ALL_SUBMENU_ANT1_OUTPUTS:
00295                         for (unsigned char i=1;i<=20;i++)
00296                                 if (driver_status.driver_output_type[i-1] == BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_SUBMENU_ANT1_OUTPUT)
00297                                         deactivate_output(bus_message.from_addr,i);
00298                         break;
00299                 case BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_SUBMENU_ANT2_OUTPUT:
00300                         for (unsigned char i=0;i<bus_message.length;i++)
00301                                 activate_output(bus_message.from_addr,bus_message.data[i], BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_SUBMENU_ANT2_OUTPUT);
00302                         break;
00303                 case BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_SUBMENU_ANT2_OUTPUT:
00304                         for (unsigned char i=0;i<bus_message.length;i++)
00305                                 deactivate_output(bus_message.from_addr,bus_message.data[i]);
00306                         break;
00307                 case BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_ALL_SUBMENU_ANT2_OUTPUTS:
00308                         for (unsigned char i=1;i<=20;i++)
00309                                 if (driver_status.driver_output_type[i-1] == BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_SUBMENU_ANT2_OUTPUT)
00310                                         deactivate_output(bus_message.from_addr,i);
00311                         break;
00312                 case BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_SUBMENU_ANT3_OUTPUT:
00313                         for (unsigned char i=0;i<bus_message.length;i++)
00314                                 activate_output(bus_message.from_addr,bus_message.data[i], BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_SUBMENU_ANT3_OUTPUT);
00315                         break;
00316                 case BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_SUBMENU_ANT3_OUTPUT:
00317                         for (unsigned char i=0;i<bus_message.length;i++)
00318                                 deactivate_output(bus_message.from_addr,bus_message.data[i]);
00319                         break;
00320                 case BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_ALL_SUBMENU_ANT3_OUTPUTS:
00321                         for (unsigned char i=1;i<=20;i++)
00322                                 if (driver_status.driver_output_type[i-1] == BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_SUBMENU_ANT3_OUTPUT)
00323                                         deactivate_output(bus_message.from_addr,i);
00324                         break;
00325                 case BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_SUBMENU_ANT4_OUTPUT:
00326                         for (unsigned char i=0;i<bus_message.length;i++)
00327                                 activate_output(bus_message.from_addr,bus_message.data[i], BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_SUBMENU_ANT4_OUTPUT);
00328                         break;
00329                 case BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_SUBMENU_ANT4_OUTPUT:
00330                         for (unsigned char i=0;i<bus_message.length;i++)
00331                                 deactivate_output(bus_message.from_addr,bus_message.data[i]);
00332                         break;
00333                 case BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_ALL_SUBMENU_ANT4_OUTPUTS:
00334                         for (unsigned char i=1;i<=20;i++)
00335                                 if (driver_status.driver_output_type[i-1] == BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_SUBMENU_ANT4_OUTPUT)
00336                                         deactivate_output(bus_message.from_addr,i);
00337                         break;
00338                 case BUS_CMD_SYNC:
00339                         break;
00340                 default:
00341                         
00342                         break;
00343         }
00344         
00345         //Drop the message
00346         rx_queue_drop();
00347 }

00352 unsigned char read_ext_addr(void) {
00353         return(~(PINE >> 2) & 0x0F);
00354 }
00355 
00357 void set_ptt_led_status(unsigned char state) {
00358         PORTF = state;
00359 }
00360 
00364 unsigned char get_ptt_status(void) {
00365         unsigned char status = 0;
00366 
00367         //Set the order correctly
00368         status  = (PINA >> 6) & 0x01; //R1
00369         status |= (PINA >> 3) & 0x02; //R2
00370         status |= PINA & 0x04;        //R3
00371         status |= (PINA << 3) & 0x08; //R4
00372         status |= (PINA >> 1) & 0x10; //R5
00373         status |= (PINA << 2) & 0x20; //R6
00374         status |= (PINA << 5) & 0x40; //R7
00375         
00376         return(status);
00377 }
00378 
00380 int main(void)
00381 {
00382         cli();
00383         
00384         delay_ms(250);
00385 
00386         init_ports();
00387 
00388         delay_ms(250);
00389 
00390         driver_status.driver_output_state = 0;
00391 
00392         /* Initialize various hardware resources */
00393 
00394         /* Read the external address of the device */
00395         bus_set_address(BUS_BASE_ADDR+read_ext_addr());
00396 
00397         /* This delay is simply so that if you have the devices connected to the same power supply
00398         all units should not send their status messages at the same time. Therefor we insert a delay
00399         that is based on the external address of the device */
00400         for (unsigned char i=0;i<bus_get_address();i++)
00401                 delay_ms(90);
00402 
00403         //Initialize the communication bus      
00404         bus_init();
00405         
00406         if ((BUS_BASE_ADDR+read_ext_addr()) == 0x01)
00407                 bus_set_is_master(1,DEF_NR_DEVICES);
00408         else
00409                 bus_set_is_master(0,0);
00410 
00411         //Timer used for the communication bus. The interrupt is caught in bus.c
00412         init_timer_2(); 
00413         
00414         //Timer with interrupts each ms
00415         init_timer_0();
00416         
00417         sei();
00418 
00419         //Check which kind of driver card this is
00420         if (PINF & (1<<7))
00421                 device_id = DEVICE_ID_DRIVER_POS;
00422         else
00423                 device_id = DEVICE_ID_DRIVER_NEG;
00424 
00425         for (unsigned char i=1;i<=20;i++)
00426                 deactivate_output(0x00,i);
00427 
00428         unsigned char device_count = bus_get_device_count();
00429 
00430         while(1) {
00431                 if (!rx_queue_is_empty()) {
00432                         bus_parse_message();
00433                 }
00434 
00435                 if (!tx_queue_is_empty())
00436                         bus_check_tx_status();
00437                         
00438                 //If this device should act as master it should send out a SYNC command
00439                 //and also the number of devices (for the time slots) that are active on the bus
00440                 if (bus_is_master()) {
00441                         if (counter_sync >= BUS_MASTER_SYNC_INTERVAL) {
00442                                 bus_add_tx_message(bus_get_address(), BUS_BROADCAST_ADDR, 0, BUS_CMD_SYNC, 1, &device_count);
00443                                 counter_sync = 0;
00444                         }
00445                 }
00446 
00447                 if (bus_allowed_to_send()) {
00448                         //Check if a ping message should be sent out on the bus
00449                         if (counter_ping_interval >= BUS_DEVICE_STATUS_MESSAGE_INTERVAL) {
00450                                 //Check if the device is a POS or NEG driver module
00451                                 bus_add_tx_message(bus_get_address(), BUS_BROADCAST_ADDR, 0, BUS_CMD_PING, 1, &device_id);
00452 
00453                                 counter_ping_interval = 0;
00454                         }
00455                 }
00456                 
00457                 //Check the PTT inputs
00458                 if (check_ptt_status) {
00459                         //Set the PTT leds
00460                         set_ptt_led_status(get_ptt_status());
00461                         
00462                         check_ptt_status = 0;
00463                 }
00464         }
00465         
00466         return (0);
00467 }
00468 
00470 ISR(SIG_OUTPUT_COMPARE0) {
00471         counter_sync++;
00472         counter_ping_interval++;
00473         counter_compare0++;
00474         
00475         check_ptt_status = 1;
00476 
00477         bus_ping_tick();
00478 }
